text: Azanaba Intumwa kuri bene Isiraheli (ababwire) ati “Mu by’ukuri, njye mbazaniye igitangaza giturutse kwa Nyagasani wanyu; ndababumbira mu ibumba ikimeze nk’inyoni, ngihuhemo maze gihinduke inyoni ku bushobozi bwa Allah. Ndakiza uwavukanye ubumuga bwo kutabona, umubembe, nzure abapfuye mbishobojwe na Allah, ndetse mbabwire ibyo mwariye n’ibyo muhunitse mu ngo zanyu.” Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo ikimenyetso kuri mwe, niba koko muri abemera
